attributes.action: Cameron Clegg and Osbourne be forced to live for 1 month on the same salary as the average person whilst paying for their own petrol and parking.
attributes.additional_details: Cameron Clegg and Osbourne be forced to live for 1 month on the same salary as the average person whilst paying for their own petrol and parking in their nice chauffeur driven government cars so they might have a reality check on the damage high fuel and parking costs have for people who have to use a motor vehicle for work. Is it any wonder our economy is on it's knees? Petrol and Diesel to be reduced to less than £1.00 litre so people can afford to get to work.

rejection.details: This appaears to be two sperate petitions in one - grateful if they could be seperated out.
